name: Impostor Skyline Hoverboard
description:
Available for android and pc.

The pc is a crappy port from mobile. Recommended to play only the mobile version.

Use A and D to move, or tap left or right.

When hitting a jumpad you can also press w or s to flip up or down, or tap up or down to flip.

Game is intended for play store, will have the link here once its on the play store.

Simple endless runner with a physics-based hoveboard twist.
